DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate fusion rate clinical outcome 1 year 20 patient degenerative disc disease undergo Transforaminal Lumbar Interbody Fusion ( TLIF ) Stryker Tritanium Spinal System . This on-label , post-market outcome study build body long-term evidence device .
